channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Female breadwinners represent just 16% of all households, but account for 42% of divorces
item.description: Women who out-earn their husbands have options.

item.title: Why the CPO of Garner Health believes in a culture of ‘radical candor’
item.description: The health tech company encourages employees to write reviews of each other, which end up getting seen by everyone.

item.title: Snow White built Disney into entertainment powerhouse, now its remake risks becoming a culture war casualty and its biggest flop
item.description: Its $43 million domestic box office fell well below initial projections amid 'Seven Kajillion Controversies" that mired the live-action musical remake...

item.title: L’Oréal and other beauty giants are pleading with the EU to exclude American cosmetics from its tariff war
item.description: A tit-for-tat tariff sweep from Europe is "going to penalize Europe much more than American businesses and companies," L’Oréal's CEO said.

item.title: BYD sales top Tesla as tech focus wins over Chinese drivers
item.description: Tesla still leads in market valuation, however: Elon Musk's EV maker is worth about $800 billion, while BYD's market cap is closer to $157 billion.

item.title: Economic calendar: GDP, inflation reports — and housing data — on week’s docket
Why Deutsche Bank prefers ‘MEGA’ to ‘MAGA.’ (The ‘e’ is for ‘Europe.’)
DNA-test company 23andMe files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy
How Saratoga Spring Water became a TikTok trend. (Yes, the trend is investable.)
Dow jumps 500 points as Wall Street anticipates toned-down tariff regime
